heated-machines.title: Heated Machines
heated-machines.material: stainless steel, synthetic hair, indoor heater, projection mapping, sound

tied.title: Tied
tied.description: A project based on user data downloaded from Amazon. Tied to consumption, I'm always moving, buying. The hologram displays all the things I purchased in the past 3 months. All of them play an important yet temporary role in my life. Movement of hair is based on duration of times I spent shopping, according to data collected by Amazon.
tied.material: acrylic, synthetic hair, fishing string, arduino, screen

synapses.title: synapses: collab work with Ryan Elgin
synapses.description: A collaborative project investigating the structures of the human brain and computer operating systems. How does memory and attention deteriorate over time in both the organic and artificial mind?
synapses.material: Metal, Plaster, Hardware, 3D Environment, Sound, Projection Mapping (05:26)

suffocate.title: suffocate
suffocate.description: Unlike an oxygen mask, this machine pumps water into the globe, eventually leaving no space for the white floaty inside.

lamp.title: lamp
lamp.description: A kinetic lamp that responds to environment light
